```py from jinja2 import Template # Define the template template_str = '''
    {% for item in items %}
  • {{ item }}
    • {% endfor %}
''' ```

```py
# Create the Jinja2 template object
template = Template(template_str)
```

```py
# Generate the list of items
items = ['Item 1', 'Item 2', 'Item 3', 'Item 4', 'Item 5', 'Item 6', 'Item 7', 'Item 8', 'Item 9', 'Item 10']
```

```py
# Render the template with the items
output = template.render(items=items)
```

```py
library_data = list()
library_data.append({"python_library": "Flask",
           "description": "An unopinionated web framework",
           "rating": 5,
           "url": "https://pypi.org/project/Flask"})
library_data.append({"python_library": "Jinja2",
           "description": "Templating library",
           "rating": 3,
           "url": "https://pypi.org/project/Jinja2"})
```

```py
from flask import Flask, render_template
app = Flask(__name__)
library_data = list()
library_data.append({"python_library": "Flask",
           "description": "An unopinionated web framework",
           "rating": 5,
           "url": "https://pypi.org/project/Flask"})
library_data.append({"python_library": "Jinja2",
           "description": "Templating library",
           "rating": 3,
           "url": "https://pypi.org/project/Jinja2"})
@app.route('/', methods=['GET'])
def root(): # put application's code here
  return render_template("index.html", library_data=library_data)
if __name__ == '__main__':
  app.run()
```

```py           {% for data in library_data %}                            {{ data.python_library }}               {{ data.description }}                                {% for _ in range(data.rating) %}                                    {% endfor %}                              View on pypi.org                        {% endfor %} ```
```py         {% else %}                        No libraries to display                    {% endif %}          ```
